name: grid.token.art.03
description:
Owners who collected and burned a grid.token get the chance receive a unique artwork created by Mark Knol. The artwork will be creatively and procedurally painted using provided avatar/photo/art of choice and send to their Tezos wallet as NFT. The collected grid will be the base for the new artwork.  
---

This OBJKT is the first result of the burned "grid.token.03" (OBJKT #347715).

Personal note:  
This one has very special story. Clint requested to be this artwork to be based on his very own "Convergence Series 6 #6" (OBJKT #266478). But his artwork was actually a tribute and based on "circular.grid.neon.01" (OBJKT #243704) which is created by me. The circle is round. Thanks Clint!

More info about grid.tokens https://grid-tokens.stroep.nl/

grid.token.03 was claimed by 
Clint Fulkerson (tz1VjaaBTjSEywNDdtHyQsdPKquDxKMwkmWp) @clintfulkerson
